amendment.description: Amendment condemns the policy and practice of murdering Palestinians for sales of land to Jews.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to express the sense of Congress condemning the policy of Palestinian policy of imposing the death penalty for any Palestinian who sells land to a Jew.
